problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, in the parallelogram ABCD, EF ∥ AB, DE:EA=N_0:N_1,EF=N_2, then the length of CD ()
raw_answer: 解:∵DE:EA=2:3,∴DE:DA=2:5．∵EF∥AB,∴△DEF∽△DAB．∴\frac{DE}{DA}=\frac{EF}{AB}．∵EF=6,∴\frac{2}{5}=\frac{6}{AB}．∴AB=15．又∵四边形ABCD是平行四边形,∴CD=AB=15,故选:C．
raw_comment: 此题考查相似三角形的判定和性质,掌握平行四边形的性质,会利用相似三角形求解一些简单的计算问题．
